name: Frame Breaker '85
subtitle: AI-Powered Brick Smasher
description: An AI-powered brick breaker game with retro 80s aesthetics. Each level is dynamically generated using Google's Gemini AI to create unique, challenging patterns. Features power-ups, power-downs, and authentic arcade gameplay.
ogTitle: Frame Breaker '85 - AI-Powered Retro Arcade Game
ogDescription: Experience the ultimate brick breaker with AI-generated levels, retro 80s aesthetics, and modern gameplay mechanics. Every level is unique!
